ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.1_0: having sexual intercourse with the seven classes of offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.2_0: having sexual intercourse with the three kinds of offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:1.3_0: They may be expelled to the aggregates of offenses, with a serious offense in the shoulder of wrong conduct. ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:2.1_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:2.2_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spit in water, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.4:3.1_0: The fourth section for recitation on inclusive is finished.
